scripts.build: npm run build:pitch1 && npm run build:pitch2 && npm run build:pitch3 && npm run build:pitch4
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:analysis && npm run build:validation && npm run build:jtbd && npm run build:b2g
scripts.build:analysis: vivliostyle build competitive-analysis.md -o output/competitive-analysis.pdf --size A4 --style content/styles/dutch-government.css
scripts.build:validation: vivliostyle build validation-framework.md -o output/validation-framework.pdf --size A4 --style content/styles/dutch-government.css
scripts.build:jtbd: vivliostyle build jtbd-new-ideas.md -o output/jtbd-new-ideas.pdf --size A4 --style content/styles/dutch-government.css
scripts.build:b2g: vivliostyle build b2g-government-ideas.md -o output/b2g-government-ideas.pdf --size A4 --style content/styles/dutch-government.css
